overview: Behind his best-selling book, "Black Orchid", is a powerful, sex-hungry executive waiting to live out his utmost sexual fantasies through the writer's eyes, again.
tagline: At the Edge of Darkness, Power Replaces Passion And Boredom is Filled with Manipulation...  A decadent world of lust blindness. A burned out erotic writer with a deep desire to believe in love and innocence again...
title: Black Orchid
